professional.text: Currently working for NCR corporation on Money Movement Bill Pay Project.

awards.title: INNERSOURCE HACKATHON
awards.text: Participated in worldwide hackathon for developing the AI to help the world. Our idea was to save time of organization to check the attacks on IP. We were 11 members in team and developed the application, which checks the infected IP and give alerts. In addition, we added voice feature to execute the app using voice commands.
